post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Cool.

Download and play with Ruby & Watir from http://wtr.rubyforge.org/. The web site seems to have enough documents and tutorial to get you started.

We will contact you in a couple of days. Also, you might want to look at the project's business scenario (http://studygroup.wikispaces.com/srs.html#toc13)  and the storyboard(http://studygroup.wikispaces.com/sdd.html) when you have a chance.

Thanks.
post.title: [re] [help wanted] Ruby scripting
